item.title: Why I chose Martin as my English name
item.description: Many Chinese people now have an English name. My English name is Martin. Many people may be curious about the story behind my English name. In fact, I chose Martin as my English name because I admire Martin Luther King a lot. In the first year of high school, I learned “I Have a Dream” in my English course. This speech was so inspiring that I began to learn more about this hero in the civil rights movement.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: This is my personal website for blogs where I will share my thoughts for academic research, books, movies, sports or other interesting things. Please feel free to contact me at MartinX0712@gamil.com. PKU treehole
